text.div:
CodeSystemContentMode

How much of the content of the code system - the concepts and codes it defines - are represented in a code system resource

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include all codes defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/codesystem-content-mode

name: CodeSystemContentMode
description: How much of the content of the code system - the concepts and codes it defines - are represented in a code system resource
